00035 #define FRENZY_THRESHOLD 8
00036 #define MAX_EAT_DIST 5
00037 
00038 INT8 gbCallPriority[NUM_CREATURE_CALLS][NUM_CREATURE_CALLERS] =
00039 {
00040       {0, 0, 0 },//CALL_NONE
00041       {3, 5, 12},//CALL_1_PREY
00042       {5, 9, 12},//CALL_MULTIPLE_PREY
00043       {4, 7, 12},//CALL_ATTACKED
00044       {6, 9, 12},//CALL_CRIPPLED
00045 };
00046 
00047 INT8 gbHuntCallPriority[NUM_CREATURE_CALLS] =
00048 {
00049       4, //CALL_1_PREY
00050       5, //CALL_MULTIPLE_PREY
00051       7, //CALL_ATTACKED
00052       8  //CALL_CRIPPLED
00053 };

00055 #define PRIORITY_DECR_DISTANCE 30
00056 
00057 #define CALL_1_OPPONENT CALL_1_PREY
00058 #define CALL_MULTIPLE_OPPONENT CALL_MULTIPLE_PREY
00059 
00060 void CreatureCall( SOLDIERTYPE * pCaller )
00061 {
00062       UINT8       ubCallerType=0;
00063       UINT8       ubReceiver;
00064       INT8        bFullPriority;
00065       INT8        bPriority;
00066       SOLDIERTYPE * pReceiver;
00067       UINT16      usDistToCaller;
00068       // communicate call to all creatures on map through ultrasonics
00069 
00070       gTacticalStatus.Team[pCaller->bTeam].bAwareOfOpposition = TRUE;
00071       // bAction should be AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL (new)
00072       // usActionData is call enum #
00073       switch (pCaller->ubBodyType)
00074       {
00075             case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
00076             case YAF_MONSTER:
00077                   ubCallerType = CALLER_FEMALE;
00078                   break;
00079             case QUEENMONSTER:
00080                   ubCallerType = CALLER_QUEEN;
00081                   break;
00082             // need to add male
00083             case AM_MONSTER:
00084             case YAM_MONSTER:
00085                   ubCallerType = CALLER_MALE;
00086                   break;
00087             default:
00088                   ubCallerType = CALLER_FEMALE;
00089                   break;
00090       }
00091       if (pCaller->bHunting) // which should only be set for females outside of the hive
00092       {
00093             bFullPriority = gbHuntCallPriority[pCaller->usActionData];
00094       }
00095       else
00096       {
00097             bFullPriority = gbCallPriority[pCaller->usActionData][ubCallerType];
00098       }
00099 
00100       // OK, do animation based on body type...
00101       switch (pCaller->ubBodyType)
00102       {
00103             case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
00104             case YAF_MONSTER:
00105             case AM_MONSTER:
00106             case YAM_MONSTER:
00107 
00108                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pCaller, MONSTER_UP, 0 , FALSE );
00109                   break;
00110 
00111             case QUEENMONSTER:
00112 
00113                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pCaller, QUEEN_CALL, 0 , FALSE );
00114                   break;
00115       }
00116 
00117 
00118       for (ubReceiver = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pCaller->bTeam ].bFirstID; ubReceiver <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pCaller->bTeam ].bLastID; ubReceiver++)
00119       {
00120             pReceiver = MercPtrs[ubReceiver];
00121             if (pReceiver->bActive && pReceiver->bInSector && (pReceiver->bLife >= OKLIFE) && (pReceiver != pCaller) && (pReceiver->bAlertStatus < STATUS_BLACK))
00122             {
00123                   if (pReceiver->ubBodyType != LARVAE_MONSTER && pReceiver->ubBodyType != INFANT_MONSTER && pReceiver->ubBodyType != QUEENMONSTER)
00124                   {
00125                         usDistToCaller = PythSpacesAway( pReceiver->sGridNo, pCaller->sGridNo );
00126                         bPriority = bFullPriority - (INT8) (usDistToCaller / PRIORITY_DECR_DISTANCE);
00127                         if (bPriority > pReceiver->bCallPriority)
00128                         {
00129                               pReceiver->bCallPriority = bPriority;
00130                               pReceiver->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED; // our status can't be more than red to begin with
00131                               pReceiver->ubCaller = pCaller->ubID;
00132                               pReceiver->sCallerGridNo = pCaller->sGridNo;
00133                               pReceiver->bCallActedUpon = FALSE;
00134                               CancelAIAction(pReceiver, FORCE);
00135                               if ((bPriority > FRENZY_THRESHOLD) && (pReceiver->ubBodyType == ADULTFEMALEMONSTER || pReceiver->ubBodyType == YAF_MONSTER))
00136                               {
00137                                     // go berzerk!
00138                                     pReceiver->bFrenzied = TRUE;
00139                               }
00140                         }
00141                   }
00142             }
00143       }
00144 }

00146 INT8 CreatureDecideActionGreen( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00147 {     
00148       INT32       iChance, iSneaky = 10;
00149       //INT8            bInWater;
00150       INT8        bInGas;
00151 
00152       //bInWater = MercInWater(pSoldier);
00153 
00154       // NB creatures would ignore smoke completely :-)
00155 
00156       if ( pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_CRAWLER && pSoldier->bActionPoints < pSoldier->bInitialActionPoints)
00157       {
00158             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00159       }
00160 
00161       bInGas = InGas( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo );
00162 
00163       if (pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_MOBILE)
00164       {
00165 
00166             if (TrackScent( pSoldier ))
00167             {
00168                   return( AI_ACTION_TRACK );
00169             }
00170 
00171             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00172             // POINT PATROL: move towards next point unless getting a bit winded
00173             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00174 
00175             // this takes priority over water/gas checks, so that point patrol WILL work
00176             // from island to island, and through gas covered areas, too
00177             if ((pSoldier->bOrders == POINTPATROL) && (pSoldier->bBreath >= 50))
00178             {
00179                   if (PointPatrolAI(pSoldier))
00180                   {
00181                         if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
00182                         {
00183                               // pause at the end of the walk!
00184                               pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00185                               pSoldier->usNextActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY;
00186                         }
00187 
00188                         return(AI_ACTION_POINT_PATROL);
00189                   }
00190             }
00191 
00192             if ((pSoldier->bOrders == RNDPTPATROL) && (pSoldier->bBreath >=50))
00193             {
00194                   if (RandomPointPatrolAI(pSoldier))
00195                   {
00196                         if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
00197                         {
00198                               // pause at the end of the walk!
00199                               pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00200                               pSoldier->usNextActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY;
00201                         }
00202 
00203                         return(AI_ACTION_POINT_PATROL);
00204                   }
00205             }
00206 
00207             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00208             // WHEN LEFT IN WATER OR GAS, GO TO NEAREST REACHABLE SPOT OF UNGASSED LAND
00209             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00210 
00211             if ( /*bInWater || */ bInGas)
00212             {
00213                   pSoldier->usActionData = FindNearestUngassedLand(pSoldier);
00214 
00215                   if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00216                   {
00217       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00218                         STR16 tempstr;
00219                         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - SEEKING NEAREST UNGASSED LAND at grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00220                         AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00221       #endif
00222 
00223                         return(AI_ACTION_LEAVE_WATER_GAS);
00224                   }
00225             }
00226       }
00227 
00228       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00229       // REST IF RUNNING OUT OF BREATH
00230       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00231 
00232       // if our breath is running a bit low, and we're not in the way or in water
00233       if ((pSoldier->bBreath < 75) /*&& !bInWater*/)
00234       {
00235             // take a breather for gods sake!
00236             pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00237             return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00238       }
00239 
00240       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00241       // RANDOM PATROL:  determine % chance to start a new patrol route
00242       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00243 
00244       if (pSoldier->bMobility != CREATURE_IMMOBILE )
00245       {
00246             iChance = 25;
00247 
00248             // set base chance according to orders
00249             switch (pSoldier->bOrders)
00250             {
00251                   case STATIONARY:     iChance += -20;  break;
00252                   case ONGUARD:        iChance += -15;  break;
00253                   case ONCALL:                          break;
00254                   case CLOSEPATROL:    iChance += +15;  break;
00255                   case RNDPTPATROL:
00256                   case POINTPATROL:    iChance  =   0;  break;
00257                   case FARPATROL:      iChance += +25;  break;
00258                   case SEEKENEMY:      iChance += -10;  break;
00259             }
00260 
00261             // modify chance of patrol (and whether it's a sneaky one) by attitude
00262             switch (pSoldier->bAttitude)
00263             {
00264                   case DEFENSIVE:      iChance += -10;                 break;
00265                   case BRAVESOLO:      iChance +=   5;                 break;
00266                   case BRAVEAID:                                       break;
00267                   case CUNNINGSOLO:    iChance +=   5;  iSneaky += 10; break;
00268                   case CUNNINGAID:                      iSneaky +=  5; break;
00269                   case AGGRESSIVE:     iChance +=  10;  iSneaky += -5; break;
00270             }
00271 
00272             // reduce chance for any injury, less likely to wander around when hurt
00273             iChance -= (pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife);
00274 
00275             // reduce chance if breath is down, less likely to wander around when tired
00276             iChance -= (100 - pSoldier->bBreath);
00277 
00278             // if we're in water with land miles (> 25 tiles) away,
00279             // OR if we roll under the chance calculated
00280             if ( /*bInWater ||*/ ((INT16) PreRandom(100) < iChance))
00281             {
00282                   pSoldier->usActionData = RandDestWithinRange(pSoldier);
00283 
00284                   if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00285                   {
00286       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00287                   STR16 tempstr;
00288                   sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - RANDOM PATROL to grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00289                    AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00290       #endif
00291 
00292                         if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
00293                         {
00294                               // pause at the end of the walk!
00295                               pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00296                               pSoldier->usNextActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY;
00297                               if (pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_CRAWLER)
00298                               {
00299                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData *= 2;
00300                               }
00301                         }
00302 
00303                         return(AI_ACTION_RANDOM_PATROL);
00304                   }
00305             }
00306 
00307             /*
00308             if (pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_MOBILE)
00309             {
00310                   ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00311                   // SEEK FRIEND: determine %chance for man to pay a friendly visit
00312                   ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00313                   iChance = 25;
00314 
00315                   // set base chance and maximum seeking distance according to orders
00316                   switch (pSoldier->bOrders)
00317                   {
00318                         case STATIONARY:     iChance += -20; break;
00319                         case ONGUARD:        iChance += -15; break;
00320                         case ONCALL:                         break;
00321                         case CLOSEPATROL:    iChance += +10; break;
00322                         case RNDPTPATROL:
00323                         case POINTPATROL:    iChance  = -10; break;
00324                         case FARPATROL:      iChance += +20; break;
00325                         case SEEKENEMY:      iChance += -10; break;
00326                   }
00327 
00328                   // modify for attitude
00329                   switch (pSoldier->bAttitude)
00330                   {
00331                         case DEFENSIVE:                       break;
00332                         case BRAVESOLO:      iChance /= 2;    break;  // loners
00333                         case BRAVEAID:       iChance += 10;   break;  // friendly
00334                         case CUNNINGSOLO:    iChance /= 2;    break;  // loners
00335                         case CUNNINGAID:     iChance += 10;   break;  // friendly
00336                         case AGGRESSIVE:                      break;
00337                   }
00338 
00339                   // reduce chance for any injury, less likely to wander around when hurt
00340                   iChance -= (pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife);
00341 
00342                   // reduce chance if breath is down
00343                   iChance -= (100 - pSoldier->bBreath);         // very likely to wait when exhausted
00344 
00345                   if ((INT16) PreRandom(100) < iChance)
00346                   {
00347                         if (RandomFriendWithin(pSoldier))
00348                         {
00349             #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00350                          sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - SEEK FRIEND at grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00351                          AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00352             #endif
00353 
00354                               if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
00355                               {
00356                                     // pause at the end of the walk!
00357                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00358                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY;
00359                               }
00360 
00361                               return(AI_ACTION_SEEK_FRIEND);
00362                         }
00363                   }
00364             }
00365             */
00366 
00367             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00368             // LOOK AROUND: determine %chance for man to turn in place
00369             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00370 
00371             // avoid 2 consecutive random turns in a row
00372             if (pSoldier->bLastAction != AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING && (GetAPsToLook( pSoldier ) <= pSoldier->bActionPoints))
00373             {
00374                   iChance = 25;
00375 
00376                   // set base chance according to orders
00377                   if (pSoldier->bOrders == STATIONARY)
00378                         iChance += 25;
00379 
00380                   if (pSoldier->bOrders == ONGUARD)
00381                         iChance += 20;
00382 
00383                   if (pSoldier->bAttitude == DEFENSIVE)
00384                         iChance += 25;
00385 
00386                   if ((INT16)PreRandom(100) < iChance)
00387                   {
00388                         // roll random directions (stored in actionData) until different from current
00389                         do
00390                         {
00391                               // if man has a LEGAL dominant facing, and isn't facing it, he will turn
00392                               // back towards that facing 50% of the time here (normally just enemies)
00393                               if ((pSoldier->bDominantDir >= 0) && (pSoldier->bDominantDir <= 8) &&
00394                                     (pSoldier->bDirection != pSoldier->bDominantDir) && PreRandom(2))
00395                               {
00396                                     pSoldier->usActionData = pSoldier->bDominantDir;
00397                               }
00398                               else
00399                               {
00400                                     pSoldier->usActionData = (UINT16)PreRandom(8); 
00401                               }
00402                         } while (pSoldier->usActionData == pSoldier->bDirection);
00403 
00404       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00405                         STR16 tempstr;
00406                         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - TURNS to face direction %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00407                         AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00408       #endif
00409 
00410                         if ( ValidCreatureTurn( pSoldier, (INT8) pSoldier->usActionData ) )
00411 
00412                         //InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, (INT8) pSoldier->usActionData, ANIM_STAND ) )
00413                         {
00414                               if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
00415                               {
00416                                     // pause at the end of the turn!
00417                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00418                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY;
00419                               }
00420 
00421                               return(AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING);
00422                         }
00423                   }
00424             }
00425       }
00426 
00427       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00428       // NONE:
00429       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00430 
00431       // by default, if everything else fails, just stands in place without turning
00432       pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00433 
00434       return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00435 }

00437 INT8 CreatureDecideActionYellow( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00438 {
00439       // monster AI - heard something 
00440       UINT8 ubNoiseDir;
00441       INT16 sNoiseGridNo;
00442       INT32 iNoiseValue;
00443       INT32 iChance, iSneaky;
00444       BOOLEAN fClimb;
00445       BOOLEAN fReachable;
00446 //    INT16 sClosestFriend;
00447 
00448       if ( pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_CRAWLER && pSoldier->bActionPoints < pSoldier->bInitialActionPoints)
00449       {
00450             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00451       }
00452 
00453       // determine the most important noise heard, and its relative value
00454       sNoiseGridNo = MostImportantNoiseHeard(pSoldier,&iNoiseValue,&fClimb, &fReachable);
00455       //NumMessage("iNoiseValue = ",iNoiseValue);
00456 
00457       if (sNoiseGridNo == NOWHERE)
00458       {
00459             // then we have no business being under YELLOW status any more!
00460 #ifdef RECORDNET
00461             fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\nDecideActionYellow: ERROR - No important noise known by guynum %d\n\n",pSoldier->ubID);
00462 #endif
00463 
00464 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00465             NumMessage("DecideActionYellow: ERROR - No important noise known by guynum ",pSoldier->ubID);
00466 #endif
00467 
00468             return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00469       }
00470 
00471       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00472       // LOOK AROUND TOWARD NOISE: determine %chance for man to turn towards noise
00473       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00474 
00475       if (pSoldier->bMobility != CREATURE_IMMOBILE)
00476       {
00477             // determine direction from this soldier in which the noise lies
00478             ubNoiseDir = atan8(CenterX(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterY(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterX(sNoiseGridNo),CenterY(sNoiseGridNo));
00479 
00480             // if soldier is not already facing in that direction,
00481             // and the noise source is close enough that it could possibly be seen
00482             if ((GetAPsToLook( pSoldier ) <= pSoldier->bActionPoints) && (pSoldier->bDirection != ubNoiseDir) && PythSpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,sNoiseGridNo) <= STRAIGHT)
00483             {
00484                   // set base chance according to orders
00485                   if ((pSoldier->bOrders == STATIONARY) || (pSoldier->bOrders == ONGUARD))
00486                         iChance = 60;
00487                   else           // all other orders
00488                         iChance = 35;
00489 
00490                   if (pSoldier->bAttitude == DEFENSIVE)
00491                         iChance += 15;
00492 
00493                   if ((INT16)PreRandom(100) < iChance)
00494                   {
00495                         pSoldier->usActionData = ubNoiseDir;
00496       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00497                         STR16 tempstr;
00498                         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - TURNS TOWARDS NOISE to face direction %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00499                         AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00500       #endif
00501                         //if ( InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, (INT8) pSoldier->usActionData, ANIM_STAND ) )
00502                         if ( ValidCreatureTurn( pSoldier, (INT8) pSoldier->usActionData ) )
00503                         {
00504                               return(AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING);
00505                         }
00506                   }
00507             }
00508       }
00509 
00510       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00511       // REST IF RUNNING OUT OF BREATH
00512       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00513 
00514       // if our breath is running a bit low, and we're not in water
00515       if ((pSoldier->bBreath < 25) /*&& !MercInWater(pSoldier) */ )
00516       {
00517             // take a breather for gods sake!
00518             pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00519             return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00520       }
00521 
00522       if (pSoldier->bMobility != CREATURE_IMMOBILE && fReachable)
00523       {
00524             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00525             // SEEK NOISE
00526             ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00527 
00528             // remember that noise value is negative, and closer to 0 => more important!
00529             iChance = 75 + iNoiseValue;
00530             iSneaky = 30;
00531 
00532             // set base chance according to orders
00533             switch (pSoldier->bOrders)
00534             {
00535                   case STATIONARY:     iChance += -20;  break;
00536                   case ONGUARD:        iChance += -15;  break;
00537                   case ONCALL:                          break;
00538                   case CLOSEPATROL:    iChance += -10;  break;
00539                   case RNDPTPATROL:
00540                   case POINTPATROL:                     break;
00541                   case FARPATROL:      iChance +=  10;  break;
00542                   case SEEKENEMY:      iChance +=  25;  break;
00543             }
00544 
00545             // modify chance of patrol (and whether it's a sneaky one) by attitude
00546             switch (pSoldier->bAttitude)
00547             {
00548                   case DEFENSIVE:      iChance += -10;  iSneaky +=  15;  break;
00549                   case BRAVESOLO:      iChance +=  10;                   break;
00550                   case BRAVEAID:       iChance +=   5;                   break;
00551                   case CUNNINGSOLO:    iChance +=   5;  iSneaky +=  30;  break;
00552                   case CUNNINGAID:                      iSneaky +=  30;  break;
00553                   case AGGRESSIVE:     iChance +=  20;  iSneaky += -10;  break;
00554             }
00555 
00556             // reduce chance if breath is down, less likely to wander around when tired
00557             iChance -= (100 - pSoldier->bBreath);
00558 
00559             if ((INT16) PreRandom(100) < iChance)
00560             {
00561                   pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sNoiseGridNo, AI_ACTION_SEEK_NOISE);
00562 
00563                   if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00564                   {
00565       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00566                         STR16 tempstr;
00567                         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - INVESTIGATING NOISE at grid %d, moving to %d",
00568                               pSoldier->name,sNoiseGridNo,pSoldier->usActionData);
00569                         AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00570       #endif
00571 
00572                         return(AI_ACTION_SEEK_NOISE);
00573                   }
00574             }
00575             // Okay, we're not following up on the noise... but let's follow any
00576             // scent trails available
00577             if (TrackScent( pSoldier ))
00578             {
00579                   return( AI_ACTION_TRACK );
00580             }
00581       }
00582 
00583       
00584 
00585       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00586       // DO NOTHING: Not enough points left to move, so save them for next turn
00587       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00588 
00589 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00590       AINameMessage(pSoldier,"- DOES NOTHING (YELLOW)",1000);
00591 #endif
00592 
00593       // by default, if everything else fails, just stands in place without turning
00594       pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00595       return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00596 }
00597 
00598 INT8 CreatureDecideActionRed(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubUnconsciousOK)
00599 {
00600  // monster AI - hostile mammals somewhere around!
00601  INT16 iChance, sClosestOpponent /*,sClosestOpponent,sClosestFriend*/;
00602  INT16 sClosestDisturbance;
00603  INT16 sDistVisible;
00604  UINT8 ubCanMove,ubOpponentDir;
00605  //INT8 bInWater;
00606  INT8 bInGas;
00607  INT8 bSeekPts = 0, bHelpPts = 0, bHidePts = 0;
00608  INT16 sAdjustedGridNo;
00609  BOOLEAN fChangeLevel;
00610 
00611  // if we have absolutely no action points, we can't do a thing under RED!
00612  if (!pSoldier->bActionPoints)
00613   {
00614    pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00615    return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00616   }
00617 
00618       if ( pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_CRAWLER && pSoldier->bActionPoints < pSoldier->bInitialActionPoints)
00619       {
00620             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00621       }
00622 
00623 
00624  // can this guy move to any of the neighbouring squares ? (sets TRUE/FALSE)
00625  ubCanMove = ((pSoldier->bMobility != CREATURE_IMMOBILE) && (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= MinPtsToMove(pSoldier)));
00626 
00627  // determine if we happen to be in water (in which case we're in BIG trouble!)
00628  //bInWater = MercInWater(pSoldier);
00629 
00630  // check if standing in tear gas without a gas mask on
00631  bInGas = InGas( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo );
00632 
00633 
00634  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00635  // WHEN IN GAS, GO TO NEAREST REACHABLE SPOT OF UNGASSED LAND
00636  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00637 
00638  if (bInGas && ubCanMove)
00639   {
00640    pSoldier->usActionData = FindNearestUngassedLand(pSoldier);
00641 
00642    if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00643     {
00644 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00645       STR16 tempstr;
00646             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - SEEKING NEAREST UNGASSED LAND at grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00647      AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00648 #endif
00649 
00650      return(AI_ACTION_LEAVE_WATER_GAS);
00651     }
00652   }
00653 
00654       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00655       // CALL FOR AID IF HURT
00656   ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00657       if ( CAN_CALL( pSoldier ) )
00658       {
00659             if ((pSoldier->bActionPoints >= AP_RADIO) && (gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bMenInSector > 1))
00660             {
00661                   if (pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bOldLife)
00662                   {
00663                         // got injured, maybe call
00664                         if ((pSoldier->bOldLife == pSoldier->bLifeMax) && (pSoldier->bOldLife - pSoldier->bLife > 10))
00665                         {
00666                               // hurt for first time!
00667                               pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_CRIPPLED;
00668                               pSoldier->bOldLife = pSoldier->bLife;  // don't want to call more than once   
00669                               return(AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL);
00670                         }
00671                         else if (pSoldier->bLifeMax / pSoldier->bLife > 2)
00672                         {
00673                               // crippled, 1/3 or less health!
00674                               pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_ATTACKED;
00675                               pSoldier->bOldLife = pSoldier->bLife;  // don't want to call more than once   
00676                               return(AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL);
00677                         }
00678                   }
00679             }
00680       }
00681 
00682 
00683  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00684  // CROUCH & REST IF RUNNING OUT OF BREATH
00685  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00686 
00687  // if our breath is running a bit low, and we're not in water or under fire
00688  if ((pSoldier->bBreath < 25) /*&& !bInWater*/ && !pSoldier->bUnderFire)
00689   {
00690 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00691       STR16 tempstr;
00692         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s RESTS (STATUS RED), breath = %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->bBreath);
00693    AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00694 #endif
00695 
00696    pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00697    return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00698   }
00699 
00700       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00701       // CALL IN SIGHTING: determine %chance to call others and report contact
00702       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00703 
00704       // if we're a computer merc, and we have the action points remaining to RADIO
00705       // (we never want NPCs to choose to radio if they would have to wait a turn)
00706       if ( CAN_CALL( pSoldier ) && (!gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bAwareOfOpposition) )
00707       {
00708             if ((pSoldier->bActionPoints >= AP_RADIO) && (gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bMenInSector > 1))
00709             {
00710                   // if there hasn't been a general sighting call sent yet
00711 
00712                   // might want to check the specifics of who we see 
00713                   iChance = 20;
00714                   
00715                   if (iChance)
00716                   {
00717                         #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00718                               AINumMessage("Chance to call sighting = ",iChance);
00719                         #endif
00720 
00721                         if ((INT16) PreRandom(100) < iChance)
00722                         {
00723                               #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00724                                     AINameMessage(pSoldier,"decides to call an alert!",1000);
00725                               #endif
00726                               pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_1_PREY;
00727                               return(AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL);                
00728                         }
00729                   }
00730             }
00731       }
00732 
00733       if ( pSoldier->bMobility != CREATURE_IMMOBILE )
00734       {
00735             if ( FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON ) == ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
00736             {
00737                   // probably a baby bug... run away! run away!
00738              // look for best place to RUN AWAY to (farthest from the closest threat)
00739              pSoldier->usActionData = FindSpotMaxDistFromOpponents( pSoldier );
00740 
00741              if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00742              {
00743                    return(AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY);
00744              }
00745              else
00746              {
00747                   return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00748              }
00749 
00750             }
00751 
00752             // Respond to call if any
00753             if ( CAN_LISTEN_TO_CALL( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->ubCaller != NOBODY )
00754             {
00755                   if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sCallerGridNo ) <= STOPSHORTDIST )
00756                   {
00757                         // call completed... hmm, nothing found
00758                         pSoldier->ubCaller = NOBODY;
00759                   }
00760                   else
00761                   {
00762                         pSoldier->usActionData = InternalGoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier, pSoldier->sCallerGridNo, -1, AI_ACTION_SEEK_FRIEND, FLAG_STOPSHORT);
00763 
00764                         if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00765                         {
00766                               #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00767                               STR16 tempstr;
00768                               sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - SEEKING FRIEND at %d, MOVING to %d",
00769                                     pSoldier->name,sClosestFriend,pSoldier->usActionData);
00770                                     AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00771                               #endif
00772                               return(AI_ACTION_SEEK_FRIEND);
00773                         }
00774                   }
00775             }
00776 
00777             // get the location of the closest reachable opponent
00778             sClosestDisturbance = ClosestReachableDisturbance(pSoldier,ubUnconsciousOK, &fChangeLevel);
00779             // if there is an opponent reachable
00780             if (sClosestDisturbance != NOWHERE)
00781             {
00782                   //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00783                   // SEEK CLOSEST DISTURBANCE: GO DIRECTLY TOWARDS CLOSEST KNOWN OPPONENT
00784                   //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00785 
00786                   // try to move towards him
00787                   pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sClosestDisturbance,AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT);
00788 
00789                   // if it's possible
00790                   if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
00791                   {
00792                         #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00793                               // do it!
00794                               STR16 tempstr;
00795                               sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - SEEKING OPPONENT at grid %d, MOVING to %d",
00796                               pSoldier->name,sClosestDisturbance,pSoldier->usActionData);
00797                               AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00798                         #endif
00799 
00800                         return(AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT);
00801                   }
00802             }
00803 
00804        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00805        // TAKE A BITE, PERHAPS
00806        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////       
00807        if (pSoldier->bHunting)
00808        {
00809          pSoldier->usActionData = FindNearestRottingCorpse( pSoldier );
00810              // need smell/visibility check?
00811              if (PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->usActionData) < MAX_EAT_DIST )
00812              {
00813                    INT16 sGridNo;
00814                    
00815                    sGridNo = FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, pSoldier->usActionData, &ubOpponentDir, &sAdjustedGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
00816                    
00817                    if ( sGridNo != -1 )
00818                    {
00819                               pSoldier->usActionData = sGridNo;
00820                               return( AI_ACTION_APPROACH_MERC );
00821                    }
00822              }
00823        }
00824 
00825        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00826        // TRACK A SCENT, IF ONE IS PRESENT
00827        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////       
00828        if (TrackScent( pSoldier ))
00829             {
00830                   return( AI_ACTION_TRACK );
00831             }
00832 
00833 
00834        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00835        // LOOK AROUND TOWARD CLOSEST KNOWN OPPONENT, IF KNOWN
00836        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00837        if (GetAPsToLook( pSoldier ) <= pSoldier->bActionPoints)
00838        {
00839              // determine the location of the known closest opponent
00840              // (don't care if he's conscious, don't care if he's reachable at all)
00841              sClosestOpponent = ClosestKnownOpponent(pSoldier, NULL, NULL);
00842 
00843              if (sClosestOpponent != NOWHERE)
00844                   {
00845                    // determine direction from this soldier to the closest opponent
00846                    ubOpponentDir = atan8(CenterX(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterY(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterX(sClosestOpponent),CenterY(sClosestOpponent));
00847 
00848                    // if soldier is not already facing in that direction,
00849                    // and the opponent is close enough that he could possibly be seen
00850                    // note, have to change this to use the level returned from ClosestKnownOpponent
00851                    sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sClosestOpponent, 0, pSoldier );
00852 
00853                    if ((pSoldier->bDirection != ubOpponentDir) && (PythSpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,sClosestOpponent) <= sDistVisible))
00854                         {
00855                          // set base chance according to orders
00856                          if ((pSoldier->bOrders == STATIONARY) || (pSoldier->bOrders == ONGUARD))
00857                                iChance = 50;
00858                          else           // all other orders
00859                                iChance = 25;
00860 
00861                          if (pSoldier->bAttitude == DEFENSIVE)
00862                                iChance += 25;
00863 
00864                          //if ( (INT16)PreRandom(100) < iChance && InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, ubOpponentDir, ANIM_STAND ) )
00865                          if ( (INT16)PreRandom(100) < iChance && ValidCreatureTurn( pSoldier, ubOpponentDir ) )
00866                          {
00867                                pSoldier->usActionData = ubOpponentDir;
00868 
00869             #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00870                               STR16 tempstr;
00871                                sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - TURNS TOWARDS CLOSEST ENEMY to face direction %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00872                                AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00873             #endif
00874 
00875                                return(AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING);
00876                               }
00877                         }
00878                   }
00879             }
00880       }
00881 
00882       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00883       // LEAVE THE SECTOR
00884       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00885 
00886       // NOT IMPLEMENTED
00887 
00888  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00889  // DO NOTHING: Not enough points left to move, so save them for next turn
00890  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00891 
00892 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00893  AINameMessage(pSoldier,"- DOES NOTHING (RED)",1000);
00894 #endif
00895 
00896  pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00897 
00898  return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00899 }
00900 
00901 
00902 INT8 CreatureDecideActionBlack( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00903 {
00904       // monster AI - hostile mammals in sense range
00905  INT16            sClosestOpponent,sBestCover = NOWHERE;
00906  INT16            sClosestDisturbance;
00907  UINT8            ubMinAPCost,ubCanMove/*,bInWater*/,bInGas;
00908  INT8             bDirection;
00909  UINT8            ubBestAttackAction;
00910  INT8             bCanAttack;
00911  INT8             bSpitIn, bWeaponIn;
00912  UINT32           uiChance;
00913  ATTACKTYPE BestShot, BestStab, BestAttack, CurrStab;
00914  BOOLEAN    fRunAway = FALSE;
00915  BOOLEAN    fChangeLevel;
00916 
00917  // if we have absolutely no action points, we can't do a thing under BLACK!
00918  if (!pSoldier->bActionPoints)
00919   {
00920    pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00921    return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00922   }
00923 
00924       if ( pSoldier->bMobility == CREATURE_CRAWLER && pSoldier->bActionPoints < pSoldier->bInitialActionPoints)
00925       {
00926             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00927       }
00928 
00929       ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00930       // CALL FOR AID IF HURT OR IF OTHERS ARE UNAWARE
00931   ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00932 
00933       if ( CAN_CALL( pSoldier ) )
00934       {
00935             if ((pSoldier->bActionPoints >= AP_RADIO) && (gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bMenInSector > 1))
00936             {
00937                   if (pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bOldLife)
00938                   {
00939                         // got injured, maybe call
00940                         /*
00941                         // don't call when crippled and have target... save breath for attacking!
00942                         if ((pSoldier->bOldLife == pSoldier->bLifeMax) && (pSoldier->bOldLife - pSoldier->bLife > 10))
00943                         {
00944                               // hurt for first time!
00945                               pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_CRIPPLED;
00946                               pSoldier->bOldLife = pSoldier->bLife;  // don't want to call more than once   
00947                               return(AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL);
00948                         }
00949                         else 
00950                         */
00951                         if (pSoldier->bLifeMax / pSoldier->bLife > 2)
00952                         {
00953                               // crippled, 1/3 or less health!
00954                               pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_ATTACKED;
00955                               pSoldier->bOldLife = pSoldier->bLife;  // don't want to call more than once   
00956                               return(AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL);
00957                         }
00958                   }
00959                   else
00960                   {
00961                         if (!(gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bAwareOfOpposition))
00962                         {
00963                               if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER)
00964                               {
00965                                     uiChance = 100;
00966                               }
00967                               else
00968                               {
00969                                     uiChance = 20 * pSoldier->bOppCnt;
00970                               }
00971                               if ( Random( 100 ) < uiChance )
00972                               {
00973                                     // alert! alert!
00974                                     if (pSoldier->bOppCnt > 1)
00975                                     {
00976                                           pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_MULTIPLE_PREY;
00977                                     }
00978                                     else
00979                                     {
00980                                           pSoldier->usActionData = CALL_1_PREY;
00981                                     }
00982                                     return(AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL);                
00983                               }
00984                         }
00985                   }
00986             }
00987       }
00988 
00989  // can this guy move to any of the neighbouring squares ? (sets TRUE/FALSE)
00990  ubCanMove = ((pSoldier->bMobility != CREATURE_IMMOBILE) && (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= MinPtsToMove(pSoldier)));
00991 
00992  // determine if we happen to be in water (in which case we're in BIG trouble!)
00993  //bInWater = MercInWater(pSoldier);
00994 
00995  // check if standing in tear gas without a gas mask on
00996       bInGas = InGas( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo );
00997 
00998 
00999  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01000  // IF GASSED, OR REALLY TIRED (ON THE VERGE OF COLLAPSING), TRY TO RUN AWAY
01001  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01002 
01003  // if we're desperately short on breath (it's OK if we're in water, though!)
01004  if (bInGas || (pSoldier->bBreath < 5))
01005   {
01006    // if soldier has enough APs left to move at least 1 square's worth
01007    if (ubCanMove)
01008     {
01009      // look for best place to RUN AWAY to (farthest from the closest threat)
01010      pSoldier->usActionData = FindSpotMaxDistFromOpponents(pSoldier);
01011 
01012      if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
01013       {
01014 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01015             STR16 tempstr;
01016               sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - GASSED or LOW ON BREATH (%d), RUNNING AWAY to grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->bBreath,pSoldier->usActionData);
01017        AIPopMessage(tempstr);
01018 #endif
01019 
01020        return(AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY);
01021       }
01022     }
01023 
01024   }
01025 
01026 
01027  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01028  // STUCK IN WATER OR GAS, NO COVER, GO TO NEAREST SPOT OF UNGASSED LAND
01029  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01030 
01031  // if soldier in water/gas has enough APs left to move at least 1 square
01032  if ((/*bInWater ||*/ bInGas) && ubCanMove)
01033   {
01034    pSoldier->usActionData = FindNearestUngassedLand(pSoldier);
01035 
01036    if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
01037     {
01038 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01039             STR16 tempstr;
01040             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - SEEKING NEAREST UNGASSED LAND at grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
01041      AIPopMessage(tempstr);
01042 #endif
01043 
01044      return(AI_ACTION_LEAVE_WATER_GAS);
01045     }
01046       }
01047 
01048  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01049  // SOLDIER CAN ATTACK IF NOT IN WATER/GAS AND NOT DOING SOMETHING TOO FUNKY
01050  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01051 
01052       // NPCs in water/tear gas without masks are not permitted to shoot/stab/throw
01053       if ((pSoldier->bActionPoints < 2) /*|| bInWater*/ || bInGas)
01054       {
01055             bCanAttack = FALSE;
01056       }
01057       else
01058       {
01059             bCanAttack = CanNPCAttack(pSoldier);
01060             if (bCanAttack != TRUE)
01061             {
01062                   if ( bCanAttack == NOSHOOT_NOAMMO )
01063                   {
01064                         pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].fFlags |= OBJECT_AI_UNUSABLE;
01065 
01066                         // try to find a bladed weapon
01067                         if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER)
01068                         {
01069                               bWeaponIn = FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_TENTACLES );
01070                         }
01071                         else
01072                         {
01073                               bWeaponIn = FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_BLADE );
01074                         }
01075 
01076                         if ( bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT )
01077                         {
01078                               DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"creaturedecideactionblack: swapping item into hand");
01079                               RearrangePocket(pSoldier,HANDPOS,bWeaponIn,FOREVER);
01080                               bCanAttack = TRUE;
01081                         }
01082                         else
01083                         {
01084                               // infants who exhaust their spit should flee!
01085                               fRunAway = TRUE;
01086                               bCanAttack = FALSE;
01087                         }
01088 
01089                   }
01090                   else
01091                   {
01092                         bCanAttack = FALSE;
01093                   }
01094 
01095             }
01096       }
01097 
01098 
01099  BestShot.ubPossible  = FALSE;      // by default, assume Shooting isn't possible
01100  BestStab.ubPossible  = FALSE;      // by default, assume Stabbing isn't possible
01101 
01102  BestAttack.ubChanceToReallyHit = 0;
01103 
01104  bSpitIn = NO_SLOT;
01105 
01106 
01107  // if we are able attack
01108  if (bCanAttack)
01109  {
01110       //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01111       // FIRE A GUN AT AN OPPONENT
01112       //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01113 
01114   pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_RANDOM;
01115 
01116       bWeaponIn = FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_GUN );
01117 
01118       if (bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT)
01119       {
01120             if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bWeaponIn].usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && pSoldier->inv[bWeaponIn].bGunStatus >= USABLE)
01121             {
01122                   if (pSoldier->inv[bWeaponIn].ubGunShotsLeft > 0)
01123                   {
01124                         bSpitIn = bWeaponIn;
01125                         // if it's in another pocket, swap it into his hand temporarily
01126                         if (bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
01127                         {
01128                               DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"creaturedecideactionblack: swapping gun into hand");
01129                               RearrangePocket(pSoldier,HANDPOS,bWeaponIn,TEMPORARILY);
01130                         }
01131 
01132                         // now it better be a gun, or the guy can't shoot (but has other attack(s))
01133 
01134                         // get the minimum cost to attack the same target with this gun
01135                         ubMinAPCost = MinAPsToAttack(pSoldier,pSoldier->sLastTarget,DONTADDTURNCOST);
01136 
01137                         // if we have enough action points to shoot with this gun
01138                         if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= ubMinAPCost)
01139                         {
01140                               // look around for a worthy target (which sets BestShot.ubPossible)
01141                               CalcBestShot(pSoldier,&BestShot,FALSE);
01142 
01143                               if (BestShot.ubPossible)
01144                               {
01145                                     BestShot.bWeaponIn = bWeaponIn;
01146 
01147                                     // if the selected opponent is not a threat (unconscious & !serviced)
01148                                     // (usually, this means all the guys we see our unconscious, but, on
01149                                     //  rare occasions, we may not be able to shoot a healthy guy, too)
01150                                     if ((Menptr[BestShot.ubOpponent].bLife < OKLIFE) &&
01151                                           !Menptr[BestShot.ubOpponent].bService)
01152                                     {
01153                                           // if our attitude is NOT aggressive
01154                                           if (pSoldier->bAttitude != AGGRESSIVE)
01155                                           {
01156                                                 // get the location of the closest CONSCIOUS reachable opponent
01157                                                 sClosestDisturbance = ClosestReachableDisturbance(pSoldier,FALSE,&fChangeLevel);
01158 
01159                                                 // if we found one
01160                                                 if (sClosestDisturbance != NOWHERE)
01161                                                 {
01162                                                       // don't bother checking GRENADES/KNIVES, he can't have conscious targets
01163                                                       #ifdef RECORDNET
01164                                                             fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\tDecideActionBlack: all visible opponents unconscious, switching to RED AI...\n");
01165                                                       #endif
01166                                                       // then make decision as if at alert status RED, but make sure
01167                                                       // we don't try to SEEK OPPONENT the unconscious guy!
01168                                                       return(DecideActionRed(pSoldier,FALSE));
01169                                                 }
01170                                                 // else kill the guy, he could be the last opponent alive in this sector
01171                                           }
01172                                           // else aggressive guys will ALWAYS finish off unconscious opponents
01173                                     }
01174 
01175                                     // now we KNOW FOR SURE that we will do something (shoot, at least)
01176                                     NPCDoesAct(pSoldier);
01177 
01178                               }
01179                         }
01180                         // if it was in his holster, swap it back into his holster for now
01181                         if (bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
01182                         {
01183                               DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"creaturedecideactionblack: swapping gun into holster");
01184                               RearrangePocket(pSoldier,HANDPOS,bWeaponIn,TEMPORARILY);
01185                         }
01186                   }
01187                   else
01188                   {
01189                         // out of ammo! reload if possible!
01190                   }
01191 
01192             }
01193 
01194       }
01195 
01196       //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01197       // GO STAB AN OPPONENT WITH A KNIFE
01198       //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01199 
01200       // if soldier has a knife in his hand
01201       if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER)
01202       {
01203             bWeaponIn = FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_TENTACLES );
01204       }
01205       else if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01206       {
01207             // 1 in 3 attack with teeth, otherwise with claws
01208             if ( PreRandom( 3 ) )
01209             {
01210                   bWeaponIn = FindObj( pSoldier, BLOODCAT_CLAW_ATTACK );
01211             }
01212             else
01213             {
01214                   bWeaponIn = FindObj( pSoldier, BLOODCAT_BITE );
01215             }
01216       }
01217       else
01218       {
01219             if (bSpitIn != NO_SLOT && Random( 4 ) )
01220             {
01221                   // spitters only consider a blade attack 1 time in 4
01222                   bWeaponIn = NO_SLOT;
01223             }
01224             else
01225             {
01226                   bWeaponIn = FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_BLADE );
01227             }
01228       }
01229 
01230 
01231 
01232       BestStab.iAttackValue = 0;
01233 
01234       // if the soldier does have a usable knife somewhere
01235 
01236       // spitters don't always consider using their claws
01237       if ( bWeaponIn != NO_SLOT )
01238       {
01239             // if it's in his holster, swap it into his hand temporarily
01240             if (bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
01241             {
01242                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"creaturedecideactionblack: swapping knife into hand");
01243                   RearrangePocket(pSoldier,HANDPOS,bWeaponIn,TEMPORARILY);
01244             }
01245 
01246             // get the minimum cost to attack with this knife
01247             ubMinAPCost = MinAPsToAttack(pSoldier,pSoldier->sLastTarget,DONTADDTURNCOST);
01248 
01249             //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - ubMinAPCost = %d",pSoldier->name,ubMinAPCost);
01250             //PopMessage(tempstr);
01251 
01252             // if we can afford the minimum AP cost to stab with this knife weapon
01253             if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= ubMinAPCost)
01254             {
01255                   // then look around for a worthy target (which sets BestStab.ubPossible)
01256                   
01257                    if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER)
01258                    {
01259                         CalcTentacleAttack( pSoldier, &CurrStab );
01260                    }
01261                    else
01262                    {
01263                         CalcBestStab(pSoldier, &CurrStab, TRUE);
01264                    }
01265 
01266                   if (CurrStab.ubPossible)
01267                   {
01268                         // now we KNOW FOR SURE that we will do something (stab, at least)
01269                         NPCDoesAct(pSoldier);
01270       }
01271 
01272                   // if it was in his holster, swap it back into his holster for now
01273                   if (bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
01274                   {
01275                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"creaturedecideactionblack: swapping knife into holster");
01276                         RearrangePocket(pSoldier,HANDPOS,bWeaponIn,TEMPORARILY);
01277                   }
01278 
01279                   if (CurrStab.iAttackValue > BestStab.iAttackValue)
01280                   {
01281                         CurrStab.bWeaponIn = bWeaponIn;
01282                         memcpy(&BestStab,&CurrStab,sizeof(BestStab));
01283                   }
01284 
01285             }
01286 
01287       }
01288 
01289       //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01290       // CHOOSE THE BEST TYPE OF ATTACK OUT OF THOSE FOUND TO BE POSSIBLE
01291       //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01292       if (BestShot.ubPossible)
01293       {
01294             BestAttack.iAttackValue = BestShot.iAttackValue;
01295             ubBestAttackAction = AI_ACTION_FIRE_GUN;
01296       }
01297       else
01298       {
01299             BestAttack.iAttackValue = 0;
01300             ubBestAttackAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
01301       }
01302       if (BestStab.ubPossible && BestStab.iAttackValue > (BestAttack.iAttackValue * 12) / 10 )
01303       {
01304             BestAttack.iAttackValue = BestStab.iAttackValue;
01305             ubBestAttackAction = AI_ACTION_KNIFE_MOVE;
01306       }
01307 
01308       // if attack is still desirable (meaning it's also preferred to taking cover)
01309       if (ubBestAttackAction != AI_ACTION_NONE)
01310       {
01311             // copy the information on the best action selected into BestAttack struct
01312             switch (ubBestAttackAction)
01313             {
01314                   case AI_ACTION_FIRE_GUN:
01315                         memcpy(&BestAttack,&BestShot,sizeof(BestAttack));
01316                         break;
01317 
01318              case AI_ACTION_KNIFE_MOVE:
01319                    memcpy(&BestAttack,&BestStab,sizeof(BestAttack));
01320                    break;
01321 
01322             }
01323 
01324              // if necessary, swap the weapon into the hand position
01325              if (BestAttack.bWeaponIn != HANDPOS)
01326              {
01327              // IS THIS NOT BEING SET RIGHT?????
01328                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"creaturedecideactionblack: swapping best weapon into hand");
01329                         RearrangePocket(pSoldier,HANDPOS,BestAttack.bWeaponIn,FOREVER);
01330              }
01331 
01332             //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01333             // GO AHEAD & ATTACK!
01334             //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01335 
01336             pSoldier->usActionData = BestAttack.sTarget;
01337             pSoldier->bAimTime                  = BestAttack.ubAimTime;
01338 
01339             if ( ubBestAttackAction == AI_ACTION_FIRE_GUN && BestAttack.ubChanceToReallyHit > 50 )
01340             {
01341                   pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
01342             }
01343             else
01344             {
01345                   pSoldier->bAimShotLocation = AIM_SHOT_RANDOM;
01346             }
01347 
01348 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01349             STR tempstr;
01350             sprintf((CHAR *) tempstr, "%d(%s) %s %d(%s) at gridno %d (%d APs aim)\n",
01351                   pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->name,
01352                   (ubBestAttackAction == AI_ACTION_FIRE_GUN)?"SHOOTS":((ubBestAttackAction == AI_ACTION_TOSS_PROJECTILE)?"TOSSES AT":"STABS"),
01353                   BestAttack.ubOpponent,ExtMen[BestAttack.ubOpponent].name,
01354                   BestAttack.sTarget,BestAttack.ubAimTime) ;
01355             DebugAI( tempstr );
01356 #endif
01357 
01358             return(ubBestAttackAction);
01359       
01360       }
01361  }
01362 
01363 
01364 
01365  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01366  // CLOSE ON THE CLOSEST KNOWN OPPONENT or TURN TO FACE HIM
01367  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01368 
01369  if ( !fRunAway )
01370  {
01371        if ( (GetAPsToLook( pSoldier ) <= pSoldier->bActionPoints) )
01372        {
01373              // determine the location of the known closest opponent
01374              // (don't care if he's conscious, don't care if he's reachable at all)  
01375              sClosestOpponent = ClosestKnownOpponent(pSoldier, NULL, NULL);
01376              // if we have a closest reachable opponent
01377              if (sClosestOpponent != NOWHERE)
01378              {
01379                         if ( ubCanMove && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sClosestOpponent ) > 2 )
01380                         {
01381                               if ( bSpitIn != NO_SLOT )
01382                               {
01383                                     pSoldier->usActionData = AdvanceToFiringRange( pSoldier, sClosestOpponent );
01384                                     if (pSoldier->usActionData == NOWHERE)
01385                                     {
01386                                           pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sClosestOpponent,AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT);
01387                                     }
01388                               }
01389                               else
01390                               {
01391                                     pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sClosestOpponent,AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT);
01392                               }
01393                         }
01394                         else
01395                         {
01396                               pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
01397                         }
01398 
01399                         if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE) // charge!
01400                         {
01401                               return( AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT );
01402                         }
01403                         else if (GetAPsToLook( pSoldier ) <= pSoldier->bActionPoints) // turn to face enemy
01404                         {
01405                          bDirection = atan8(CenterX(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterY(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterX(sClosestOpponent),CenterY(sClosestOpponent));
01406 
01407                          // if we're not facing towards him
01408                          if (pSoldier->bDirection != bDirection && ValidCreatureTurn( pSoldier, bDirection ) )
01409                          {
01410                                pSoldier->usActionData = bDirection;
01411 
01412                               #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01413                               STR16 tempstr;
01414                                sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - TURNS to face CLOSEST OPPONENT in direction %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
01415                                AIPopMessage(tempstr);
01416                               #endif
01417 
01418                                return(AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING);
01419                          }
01420                         }
01421              }
01422        }    
01423  }
01424  else
01425  {
01426       // run away!
01427        if ( ubCanMove )
01428        {
01429              // look for best place to RUN AWAY to (farthest from the closest threat)
01430              //pSoldier->usActionData = RunAway( pSoldier );
01431              pSoldier->usActionData = FindSpotMaxDistFromOpponents( pSoldier );
01432 
01433              if (pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE)
01434              {
01435                    return(AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY);
01436              }
01437        }
01438 
01439  }
01440  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01441  // DO NOTHING: Not enough points left to move, so save them for next turn
01442  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01443 
01444 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01445  AINameMessage(pSoldier,"- DOES NOTHING (BLACK)",1000);
01446 #endif
01447 
01448  // by default, if everything else fails, just stand in place and wait
01449  pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
01450  return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
01451 
01452 }

01457 INT8 CreatureDecideAction( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01458 {
01459       INT8 bAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
01460 
01461       switch (pSoldier->bAlertStatus)
01462       {
01463             case STATUS_GREEN:
01464                   #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01465                         AIPopMessage("AlertStatus = GREEN");
01466                   #endif
01467                   bAction = CreatureDecideActionGreen(pSoldier);
01468                   break;
01469 
01470             case STATUS_YELLOW:
01471                   #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01472                         AIPopMessage("AlertStatus = YELLOW");
01473                   #endif
01474                   bAction = CreatureDecideActionYellow(pSoldier);
01475             break;
01476 
01477             case STATUS_RED:
01478                   #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01479                         AIPopMessage("AlertStatus = RED");
01480                   #endif
01481                   bAction = CreatureDecideActionRed(pSoldier, TRUE);
01482                   break;
01483 
01484             case STATUS_BLACK:
01485                   #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01486                         AIPopMessage("AlertStatus = BLACK");
01487                   #endif
01488                   bAction = CreatureDecideActionBlack(pSoldier);
01489                   break;
01490       }
01491 
01492 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01493       STR tempstr;
01494       sprintf((CHAR *) tempstr, "DecideAction: selected action %d, actionData %d\n\n",bAction,pSoldier->usActionData );
01495       DebugAI(tempstr);
01496 #endif
01497 
01498       return(bAction);
01499 }
01500 
01501 void CreatureDecideAlertStatus( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01502 {
01503       INT8  bOldStatus;
01504       INT32 iDummy;
01505       BOOLEAN     fClimbDummy, fReachableDummy;
01506 
01507       // THE FOUR (4) POSSIBLE ALERT STATUSES ARE:
01508       // GREEN - No one sensed, no suspicious noise heard, go about doing regular stuff
01509       // YELLOW - Suspicious noise was heard personally
01510       // RED - Either saw OPPONENTS in person, or definite contact had been called
01511       // BLACK - Currently has one or more OPPONENTS in sight
01512 
01513       // set mobility
01514       switch (pSoldier->ubBodyType)
01515       {
01516             case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
01517             case YAF_MONSTER:
01518             case AM_MONSTER:
01519             case YAM_MONSTER:
01520             case INFANT_MONSTER:
01521                   pSoldier->bMobility = CREATURE_MOBILE;
01522                   break;
01523             case QUEENMONSTER:
01524                   pSoldier->bMobility = CREATURE_IMMOBILE;
01525                   break;
01526             case LARVAE_MONSTER:
01527                   pSoldier->bMobility = CREATURE_CRAWLER;
01528                   break;
01529       }
01530 
01531 
01532       if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER)
01533       {
01534             // larvae never do anything much!
01535             pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
01536             return;
01537       }
01538 
01539       // save the man's previous status
01540       bOldStatus = pSoldier->bAlertStatus;
01541 
01542       // determine the current alert status for this category of man
01543       if (pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0)        // opponent(s) in sight
01544       {
01545             // must search through list of people to see if any of them have
01546             // attacked us, or do some check to see if we have been attacked
01547             switch (bOldStatus)
01548             {
01549                   case STATUS_GREEN:
01550                   case STATUS_YELLOW:
01551                         pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_BLACK;
01552                         break;
01553                   case STATUS_RED:
01554                   case STATUS_BLACK:
01555                         pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_BLACK;
01556             }
01557             
01558       }
01559       else // no opponents are in sight
01560       {
01561             switch (bOldStatus)
01562             {
01563                   case STATUS_BLACK:
01564                         // then drop back to RED status
01565                         pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
01566                         break;
01567 
01568                   case STATUS_RED:
01569                         // RED can never go back down below RED, only up to BLACK
01570                         break;
01571 
01572                   case STATUS_YELLOW:
01573                         // if all enemies have been RED alerted, or we're under fire
01574                         if (gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bAwareOfOpposition || pSoldier->bUnderFire)
01575                         {
01576                               pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
01577                         }
01578                         else
01579                         {
01580                               // if we are NOT aware of any uninvestigated noises right now
01581                               // and we are not currently in the middle of an action
01582                               // (could still be on his way heading to investigate a noise!)
01583                               if ((MostImportantNoiseHeard(pSoldier,&iDummy,&fClimbDummy,&fReachableDummy) == NOWHERE) && !pSoldier->bActionInProgress)
01584                               {
01585                                     // then drop back to GREEN status
01586                                     pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
01587                               }
01588                         }
01589                         break;
01590 
01591                   case STATUS_GREEN:
01592                         // if all enemies have been RED alerted, or we're under fire
01593                         if (gTacticalStatus.Team[pSoldier->bTeam].bAwareOfOpposition || pSoldier->bUnderFire)
01594                         {
01595                               pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
01596                         }
01597                         else
01598                         {
01599                               // if we ARE aware of any uninvestigated noises right now
01600                               if (MostImportantNoiseHeard(pSoldier,&iDummy,&fClimbDummy,&fReachableDummy) != NOWHERE)
01601                               {
01602                                     // then move up to YELLOW status
01603                                     pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_YELLOW;
01604                               }
01605                         }
01606                         break;
01607             }
01608     // otherwise, RED stays RED, YELLOW stays YELLOW, GREEN stays GREEN
01609       }
01610 
01611       // if the creatures alert status has changed in any way
01612       if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus != bOldStatus)
01613       {
01614             // HERE ARE TRYING TO AVOID NPCs SHUFFLING BACK & FORTH BETWEEN RED & BLACK
01615             // if either status is < RED (ie. anything but RED->BLACK && BLACK->RED)
01616             if ((bOldStatus < STATUS_RED) || (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED))
01617             {
01618                   // force a NEW action decision on next pass through HandleManAI()
01619                   SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
01620             }
01621 
01622             // if this guy JUST discovered that there were opponents here for sure...
01623             if ((bOldStatus < STATUS_RED) && (pSoldier->bAlertStatus >= STATUS_RED))
01624             {
01625                   // might want to make custom to let them go anywhere
01626                   CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
01627             }
01628 
01629 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01630             // don't report status changes for human-controlled mercs
01631 //          if (!pSoldier->human)
01632 //          {
01633                   STR16 tempstr;
01634                   sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s's Alert Status changed from %d to %d",
01635                         pSoldier->name ,bOldStatus,pSoldier->bAlertStatus);
01636                   AIPopMessage(tempstr);
01637 //          }
01638 #endif
01639 
01640       }
01641       else   // status didn't change
01642       {
01643             // if a guy on status GREEN or YELLOW is running low on breath
01644             if (((pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_GREEN)  && (pSoldier->bBreath < 75)) ||
01645                   ((pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_YELLOW) && (pSoldier->bBreath < 50)))
01646             {
01647                   // as long as he's not in water (standing on a bridge is OK)
01648                   if (!MercInWater(pSoldier))
01649                   {
01650                         // force a NEW decision so that he can get some rest
01651                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
01652 
01653                         // current action will be canceled. if noise is no longer important
01654                         if ((pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_YELLOW) &&
01655                               (MostImportantNoiseHeard(pSoldier,&iDummy,&fClimbDummy,&fReachableDummy) == NOWHERE))
01656                         {
01657                               // then drop back to GREEN status
01658                               pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
01659                               CheckForChangingOrders(pSoldier);
01660                         }
01661                   }
01662     }
01663       }
01664 }
01665

01669 INT8 CrowDecideActionRed( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01670 {
01671       // OK, Fly away!
01672       //HandleCrowFlyAway( pSoldier );
01673       if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
01674       {
01675             pSoldier->usActionData = 30000;
01676             return( AI_ACTION_WAIT );
01677       }
01678       else
01679       {
01680             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
01681       }
01682 }
01683 
01684 
01685 INT8 CrowDecideActionGreen( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01686 {
01687       INT16 sCorpseGridNo;
01688       UINT8 ubDirection;
01689       INT16 sFacingDir;
01690 
01691       // Look for a corse!
01692       sCorpseGridNo = FindNearestRottingCorpse( pSoldier );
01693 
01694       if ( sCorpseGridNo != NOWHERE )
01695       {
01696              // Are we close, if so , peck!
01697              if ( SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sCorpseGridNo ) < 2 )
01698              {
01699                     // Change facing
01700                     sFacingDir = GetDirectionFromGridNo( sCorpseGridNo, pSoldier );
01701 
01702                         if ( sFacingDir != pSoldier->bDirection )
01703                         {
01704                                pSoldier->usActionData = sFacingDir;
01705                        return(AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING);
01706                         }
01707                         else if (!gfTurnBasedAI)
01708                         {
01709                               pSoldier->usActionData = 30000;
01710                               return( AI_ACTION_WAIT );
01711                         }
01712                         else
01713                         {
01714                               return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
01715                         }
01716              }
01717              else
01718              {
01719                    // Walk to nearest one!
01720                    pSoldier->usActionData = FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, sCorpseGridNo, 4, &ubDirection );
01721                    if ( pSoldier->usActionData != NOWHERE )
01722                    {
01723                          return( AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER );                 
01724                    }
01725              }
01726       }
01727 
01728       return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
01729 }
01730 
01731 INT8 CrowDecideAction( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01732 {
01733       if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY )
01734       {
01735             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
01736       }
01737 
01738       switch( pSoldier->bAlertStatus )
01739       {
01740             case STATUS_GREEN:
01741             case STATUS_YELLOW:
01742                   return( CrowDecideActionGreen( pSoldier ) );
01743 
01744             case STATUS_RED:
01745             case STATUS_BLACK:
01746                   return( CrowDecideActionRed( pSoldier ) );
01747 
01748             default:
01749                   Assert( FALSE );
01750                   return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
01751       }
01752 }
